user_query: I'm planning a trip to Paris next month and I want to explore the city's attractions. Can you provide me with a map tile that shows the French labels for the landmarks? Additionally, I need the geolocation details of the Eiffel Tower using the OpenCage geocoder API.

TaskList.description: Fetch geolocation details of the Eiffel Tower using the OpenCage geocoder API.
Generate a map tile that displays French labels for the landmarks in Paris.
